participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Determined and hardworking, Emily is focused on her studies and balancing work.
participant_1.background: i am in college to become a nurse. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i don't like chicken.

participant_2.name: John
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and sociable, John enjoys sharing stories from his life and engaging in light-hearted banter.
participant_2.background: i go gambling in my spare time. i move south during the winter. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i like to grill outdoors.
